div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1173 Cos, before 1891 (273) Burial: c. 480 B.C. (M) Contents: 5+ AR Mende: 1 tetradr. Peparethus: 3 tetradr. Athens: 1 tetradr. Disposition (Peparethus): London 2, Boston 1 (Brett 935) † Head, NC 1891, pp. 1-11, illus. Wroth, JHS 1907, pp. 90-6, illus. Babelon, Traité II.1, cols. 1266-7, illus. Milne, NC 1940, pp. 76-88 (the Peparethus coins attributed to Naxos and dated 467 B.C.)
